TEXT.TITLE: AUSTRALIAN TREASURY NOTE TENDER 700 MLN DLRS
TEXT.BODY: The Reserve Bank of Australia said it would offer 500 mln dlrs of 13-week treasury notes and 200 mln dlrs of 26-week notes for tender next week The Bank said it would take up 300 mln dlrs of the 13-week notes at the average yield. It is not taking up any 26-week notes. REUTER
